analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#767-789) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#772-774)

FighterOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#791-945) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#895-898)

SaleClockAuction.bid (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#540-560) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- seller == address(nonFungibleContract)

Reentrancy in FighterMinting.createGen0Auction (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#1191-1209):
	External calls:
	- saleAuction.createAuction(fighterId,_computeNextGen0Price(),gen0EndingPrice,gen0AuctionDuration,address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x87d598064c736dd0c712d329afcfaa0ccc1921a1.sol#1205-1207)
